goal: I need to schedule a meeting with a client, Ben Carter, at 1000 Chestnut Street Apartments for this Friday. I'll be coming from 1 Hotel San Francisco. First, find out the estimated travel time for a UDriver ride between those locations. Then, schedule a 1-hour meeting on my GoCalendar that starts exactly 20 minutes after my estimated arrival time. The meeting should be sometime after 2 PM. Invite ben.carter@example.com.
